name: Cellular Juggler
description:
Cellular Juggler is a free game that is an experiment in combining real-time gameplay with unique cellular automata graphics. Your objective is to keep the ball in the air as long as possible using quick reflexes and precise timing.

Move left and right with A and D keys and jump with the spacebar.

note:
this game was made in a day and a half day after I failed to finish the second game I was supposed to release in February as part of a project to release 2 games a month in 2023.
